Key Match Events: RJ Barrett suffered a right shoulder contusion on an illegal screen from Jonas Valančiūnas in the second quarter and left the game shortly after.
Jamal Shead stole a pass on his first possession, got another steal moments later, and drew an offensive foul to end the first quarter.
Jamal Shead harassed Bilal Coulibaly leading to a shot-clock violation and hounded Jordan Poole, earning praise from Immanuel Quickley.
Jamal Shead finished with 10 points, four assists, and three steals.
Gradey Dick scored four buckets in the first quarter, including midrange jumpers, a floater, and a lefty layup off the glass.
Post-Match Reflections: Raptors coach Darko Rajaković mentioned that RJ Barrett will be re-evaluated Monday.
Chris Boucher expressed his appreciation for the love from the Montreal fans, stating, 'You can feel the love, and it’s hard for me to not give it back.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chris Boucher received a huge ovation at McGill University and greeted the fans in French before the game.
The crowd and anthem singer sang 'O Canada' in French.
